channel.title: Political science help
channel.description:
first of all this class is horrrible, this is what i have to do
choose any 3 articles from the california journal of politics and policy, make a 3 page summary of the contents of each article covering the following : title of Article, main argument, summary of how evidence is adducted to support the main thesis/arguments (3 pages) then add a fourth page stating my comments on each article
how should i do the summary? i am a bit confused and i doubt anyone on here will know either since ur not taking the class but its wrth a try
